author: jonamotta
body:
#### PR description:

Upload of `caloParams_2024_v0_2`.

The caloParams are derived from `caloParams_2024_v0_1 ` and include the new eg LUTs for the 2024 data-taking after the June technical stop.

The LUTs are available in [this PR](https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/L1Trigger-L1TCalorimeter/pull/23)
More details can be found in [this JIRA Ticket](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-1294).

This update has the green light from all involved parties (eg/tau team, menu team, DPG).

FYI @aloeliger @epalencia @bundocka @caruta @slaurila @eyigitba
title: Calo Layer-2 EG conditions for 2024 post-TS
